name: APIBREEZE™
description: Provital’s takes kindness to next level and responds to today’s consumers, who are seeking personalized cosmetic solutions that are kind to the skin and the planet. A new generation of hydroxyl acids that broaden the possibilities to renew the skin with peels suitable to all skin type, season, or time of day. Apibreeze™ is a natural active ingredient, 100% natural origin (ISO16128) and COSMOS compliant that offers a mild skin renewal together with and ethical and responsible supplying with biotechnological polyhydroxy acids (PHAs) as gluconolactone and lactobionic acid, and an award-winning multi-flower honey, locally produced, to meet growing demand for sustainability and well-tolerated ingredients. Our studies in vitro have demonstrated that Apibreeze™ has a keratolytic action as effective as glycolic acid with no irritant effects. Suitable for sensitive skin, it prevents premature aging, promoting the optimal maintenance of the extracellular matrix and boosting collagen, and assures moisturizing effect, acting on hyaluronic acid synthesis. The glow of a new skin emerges naturally, whatever the skin type, season, or time of day.
